name: automatisch
description: Automatisch is an open-source alternative to Zapier for creating automated workflows between apps. It features a visual editor, triggers, filters, and supports webhook integrations for internal and third-party services.
features: Zapier Alternative: Open-source workflow automation platform. No subscription fees.
Visual Editor: Drag-and-drop workflow builder. No coding required.
Trigger System: Start workflows based on events and schedules. Automated execution.
Filter Logic: Add conditions and filters to workflows. Smart automation.
Webhook Support: Integrate with any service via webhooks. Universal connectivity.
Third-Party Apps: Connect popular services and APIs. Extensive integrations.
Self-Hosted: Run your own automation server. Complete control.
Open Source: Free forever with community support. No vendor lock-in.
